doc.title: Dystopia
doc.plot: Dystopia examines humanity and the modern metropolis as a whole. Through juxtaposing and creating visual comparisons of progressiveness, consumerism, pollution, capitalism, and its effects on persona and society, this piece creates a visual narrative utilizing the language of cinema. As this piece is edited and displayed purely in time-lapse format, Dystopia utilizes the visual example of Los Angeles to show the timelessness and nonexistent boundary lines surrounding this important subject matter. The logical structure of the editing combined with the quality of cinematography attempts to provide a visual experience about the realities of the modern structure of humanity and the metropolis.
